thread.title: Hundreds evacuated from Hamburg Airport after dozens injured from 'unknown toxin'
thread.title_full: Hundreds evacuated from Hamburg Airport after dozens injured from 'unknown toxin'

title: Hundreds evacuated from Hamburg Airport after dozens injured from 'unknown toxin'
text:
12 February 2017 at 12:56pm Hundreds evacuated from Hamburg Airport after dozens injured from 'unknown toxin' Travellers wait outside the Hamburg Airport on Sunday afternoon. Credit: AP 
Hundreds of people have been evacuated from Hamburg Airport in Germany after dozens of people were injured from an unknown toxin. 
The substance is believed to have spread through the airport's air conditioning system. 
German firefighters evacuated 33 people who complained about breathing problems and burning eyes on Sunday afternoon, according to news agency DPA. 
Those who were evacuated from the airport had to wait outside in sub-zero temperatures. 
More soon. Ambulances were seen outside the airport in Germany. Credit: AP People waited outside in sub-zero temperatures. Credit: AP
